card.name: Quicksilver
card.property: Super Speed - Response: After you use one of Quicksilver's basic powers (THW, ATK, or DEF), ready him. (Limit once per phase.)
"Super speed. Look it up."

alternate.name: Pietro Maximoff
alternate.property: Superpowered Siblings - Action: Discard 2 cards from your hand â†’ draw 2 cards (draw 3 cards instead if Wanda Maximoff is in play). (Limit once per round.)

card.name: Scarlet Witch
card.property: Interrupt: When you use one of Scarlet Witch's basic powers, discard the top card of the encounter deck. For each boost icon discarded this way, Scarlet Witch gets +1 to that power for this use.

card.name: Always Be Running
card.property: Hero Action: Ready Quicksilver.
"I'm the fastest man on Earth." - Quicksilver

card.name: Double Time
card.property: Hero Action: Choose two of the following (you may choose the same option twice): - Deal 2 damage to an enemy. - Remove 2 threat from a scheme.

card.name: Maximum Velocity
card.property:
Max 1 per phase.
Hero Action: You get +2 THW, +2 ATK, and +2 DEF until the end of the round.
"Ever been punched at supersonic speed?" - Quicksilver

card.name: Speed Cyclone
card.property: Hero Action: Stun X Enemies.
"Eat my dust." - Quicksliver

card.name: Serval Industries
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Serval Industries â†’ shuffle 2 Quicksilver cards from your discard pile into your deck.
Corporate sponsors of the superhero team known as X-Factor.

card.name: Accelerated Reflex
card.property: Quicksilver gets +1 DEF.
"Is that all you got?" - Quicksilver

card.name: Friction Resistance
card.property: Hero Response: After you ready Quicksilver, ready this card. Resource: Exhaust Friction Resistance â†’ generate a [physical] resource.

card.name: Hyper Perception
card.property: Quicksilver gets +1 THW.
"Surely you can do better than that." - Quicksilver

card.name: Reinforced Sinew
card.property: Quicksilver gets +1 ATK.
"The future is written by the winners." - Quicksilver

card.name: Multiple Man
card.property: Response: After Multiple Man enters play, search your deck and hand for a copy of Multiple Man and put it into play. Shuffle your deck if it was searched this way.
"Who wants a sandwich?!"

card.name: Warlock
card.property: Action: Spend a [mental] resource â†’ heal up to 2 damage from Warlock.
"Self thinks this is a mistake. But then, self is very young and knows very little."

card.name: Never Back Down
card.property: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you defend against an attack, you get +2 DEF for this attack. If you take no damage from this attack, stun the attacking enemy.
"Champions, charge!" - Ms. Marvel

card.name: Side Step
card.property: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage, prevent 3 of that damage. If you paid for this card using [energy] resource, deal 1 damage to that enemy.
"Missed me!" - Wasp

card.name: Nerves of Steel
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Resource: Exhaust Nerves of Steel â†’ generate a [energy] resource for a event.

card.name: Order and Chaos
card.property: Team-Up (Quicksilver and Scarlet Witch). Max 1 per deck. Hero Interrupt: When a treachery card is revealed from the encounter deck, cancel its "When Revealed" effects, then deal 2 damage to the villain.

card.name: Adrenaline Rush
card.property: Hero Action: Discard Adrenaline Rush â†’ your hero gets +1 ATK until the end of the phase.
"Wow, lady! And I thought Gamora was intense." - Rocket Raccoon

card.name: Civic Duty
card.property: Hero Action: Discard Civic Duty â†’ your hero gets +1 THW until the end of the phase.
"Please stay calm! Everything will be okay!" - Ms. Marvel

card.name: Brute Force
card.property: Your hero gets +1 ATK. Your basic attacks gain piercing. (Discard any tough status cards from the target before dealing damage.) Forced Response: After you make a basic attack, discard Brute Force.

card.name: Sense of Justice
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Resource: Exhaust Sense of Justice â†’ generate a [mental] resource for a [[Thwart]] event.

card.name: United We Stand
card.property:
Play only if your identity has the [[Avenger]] trait.
Hero Action: Heal 1 damage from up to X friendly characters (to a maximum of 3 characters), where X is equal to the villain's stage number.

card.name: Beat 'Em Up
card.property: Hero Action: Deal 1 damage to the villain and each minion engaged with you.
"too easy." - She-Hulk

card.name: Need for Speed
card.property: Give to the Pietro Maximoff player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Pietro Maximoff â†’ remove Need for Speed from the game. - Exhaust your identity. You cannot ready your identity until your next turn ends. Discard this obligation.

card.name: Extortion of Seismic Proportion
card.property: Incite 1. (When revealed, place 1 threat on the main scheme.)

card.name: Avalanche
card.property:
Incite 2. (When revealed, place 2 threat on the main scheme.)
When Revealed: Each player must choose to either take 2 indirect damage or exhaust their identity.
(Quicksilver's nemesis minion.)

card.name: Vibration Resistance
card.property: Attach to Avalanche, if able. If you cannot, attach to the villain. Reduce the damage attached enemy takes from each attack by 1. Hero Action: Exhaust your hero â†’ discard this card.

card.name: Earthquake
card.property: Incite 1. (When revealed, place 1 threat on the main scheme.) When Revealed: Discard 2 cards from your hand and exhaust your identity. Choose to either spend [physical][physical] resources or exhaust your identity.
